movie.title: Super Monsters: Santa's Super Monster Helpers
movie.title_english: Super Monsters: Santa's Super Monster Helpers
movie.title_long: Super Monsters: Santa's Super Monster Helpers (2020)
movie.description_intro: When Santa needs serious help prepping all of his presents, the Super Monsters lend a hand - and some monster magic - to get every gift out on time.
movie.description_full: When Santa needs serious help prepping all of his presents, the Super Monsters lend a hand - and some monster magic - to get every gift out on time.

movies.title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars
movies.summary: When a full-scale war is engaged by the evil Scarran Empire, the Peacekeeper Alliance has but one hope: reassemble human astronaut John Crichton, once sucked into the Peacekeeper galaxy through a wormhole. Crichton's task: Get the entire Peacekeeper race to safety before the last war of an era brings and end to the universe.
movies.description_full: When a full-scale war is engaged by the evil Scarran Empire, the Peacekeeper Alliance has but one hope: reassemble human astronaut John Crichton, once sucked into the Peacekeeper galaxy through a wormhole. Crichton's task: Get the entire Peacekeeper race to safety before the last war of an era brings and end to the universe.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.title_english: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.title_long: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (2002)
movies.summary: The continuing quest of Frodo and the Fellowship to destroy the One Ring. Frodo and Sam discover they are being followed by the mysterious Gollum. Aragorn, the Elf archer Legolas, and Gimli the Dwarf encounter the besieged Rohan kingdom, whose once great King Theoden has fallen under Saruman's deadly spell.
movies.description_full: The continuing quest of Frodo and the Fellowship to destroy the One Ring. Frodo and Sam discover they are being followed by the mysterious Gollum. Aragorn, the Elf archer Legolas, and Gimli the Dwarf encounter the besieged Rohan kingdom, whose once great King Theoden has fallen under Saruman's deadly spell.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
movies.title_english: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
movies.title_long: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World (2019)
movies.summary: As Hiccup fulfills his dream of creating a peaceful dragon utopia, Toothless' discovery of an untamed, elusive mate draws the Night Fury away. When danger mounts at home and Hiccup's reign as village chief is tested, both dragon and rider must make impossible decisions to save their kind.
movies.description_full: As Hiccup fulfills his dream of creating a peaceful dragon utopia, Toothless' discovery of an untamed, elusive mate draws the Night Fury away. When danger mounts at home and Hiccup's reign as village chief is tested, both dragon and rider must make impossible decisions to save their kind.

movies.title: For Love or Money
movies.summary: Doug is a young man who works all day as a concierge at a luxurious hotel, saving money to make his own business. Unfortunately, when he finds the financial supporter he needs, he discovers that his "savior" is having an affair with the woman he loves. Now, he must choose between money and love.
